==========================
Languages and technologies 
==========================

This application used:

Languages:

    * Python3
    * JavaScript
    * HTML5
    * CSS3
    * YAML

Technologies:

    * Django
    * pytest
    * Flake8
    * Sphinx
    * SQLite
    * Git
    * GitHub
    * GitHub actions
    * Docker
    * DockerHub
    * Sentry
    * Render
    * Read The Docs
